Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.user_interface.gui

Class DamageTrack

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • it.polimi.ingsw.client.user_interface.gui.DamageTrack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    public class DamageTrack
extends javafx.scene.Parent
    It represents a player's damageTrack

      void addSkull​(int skullNumber)
      Add a skull on this DamageTrack, and positions it on the right place, based on skullNumber
      void checkSwitchToFrenzy()
      Check: if the game is in frenzy mode, then: if the owner of this DamageTrack is frenzy, change image to full frenzy DamageTrack, else to frenzy DamageTrack

      Update the damage shown on this DamageTrack
      void updateInfo()
      Update the number of power up, weapon and images unloaded associated to playerView

    • Constructor Detail

      • DamageTrack

        public DamageTrack​(java.util.List<javafx.scene.paint.Color> markColors,
                   PlayerView playerView)
        Creates a DamageTrack. Entering on it, it will shows the number of power up, weapons and images of unloaded weapons of this player's DamageTrack
        Parameters:
        markColors - The colors of the marks shown on this DamageTrack
        playerView - The playerView associated to this DamageTrack

    • Method Detail

      • addAmmos

        private void addAmmos()
        Create and add the labels associated to player's ammo to this DamageTrack

      • addDamage

        public void addDamage​(javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
        Add a damage, on this DamageTrack, of the specified color and at the right position
        Parameters:
        color - The color of the damage to add

      • addMarkLabels

        private void addMarkLabels​(java.util.List<javafx.scene.paint.Color> colors)
        Create and add the labels associated to player's marks to this DamageTrack
        Parameters:
        colors - color of the mark label

      • addAmmo

        public void addAmmo​(javafx.scene.paint.Color color,
                    java.lang.Integer quantity)
        Set the text of the label, associated to the color, to the specified quantity
        Parameters:
        color - The color of the ammo to add
        quantity - The number of ammo to add

      • addMark

        public void addMark​(java.util.Map<PlayerView,​java.lang.Integer> markMap)
        Set all the marks label to color and quantity specified by the markMap
        Parameters:
        markMap - A map containing other PlayerView and each own number of marks on this DamageTrack

      • updateInfo

        public void updateInfo()
        Update the number of power up, weapon and images unloaded associated to playerView

      • checkSwitchToFrenzy

        public void checkSwitchToFrenzy()
        Check: if the game is in frenzy mode, then: if the owner of this DamageTrack is frenzy, change image to full frenzy DamageTrack, else to frenzy DamageTrack

      • addSkull

        public void addSkull​(int skullNumber)
        Add a skull on this DamageTrack, and positions it on the right place, based on skullNumber
        Parameters:
        skullNumber - It's represent the number of skulls on this board, in order to place properly the next one

      • updateDamage

        public void updateDamage()
        Update the damage shown on this DamageTrack

      • updateMarks

        public void updateMarks()
        Update the marks shown on this DamageTrack

      • updateSkulls

        public void updateSkulls()
        Update the skulls shown on this DamageTrack
